column5: Come stay in our brand new home for Super Bowl! Newly built and located right off Hwy 10 in a beautiful, and safe subdivision in Katy, near Katy Mills Mall. You will also be close to the beautiful La Centerra shopping center with great restaurants, and bars, and shopping. Jump on I-10 and head straight into Energy Corridor and downtown Houston. We will provide you with a courtesy pick-up and drop-off in our SUV every night of your stay! Holds up to 7 people plus driver.
column8: Beautiful Home for Super Bowl!!! Pick-up+Drop Off!
